sentences.en: "This man Tom works for a local rag," he said.
sentences.cn: “这个叫汤姆的人在一家地方小报社工作，”他说。

sentences.en: Come on, Bill. Send Tom a card and make his day.
sentences.cn: 来吧，比尔。给汤姆寄张卡片让他高兴高兴吧。

sentences.en: He crossed the line three seconds clear of Tom Snape.
sentences.cn: 他领先汤姆·斯内普3秒冲过终点线。

sentences.en: I wonder if Tom ever had his teeth fixed anywhere else.
sentences.cn: 我在想汤姆是不是在别的地方整过牙。

sentences.en: It sounds as if you have grown apart from Tom.
sentences.cn: 听起来好像你和汤姆之间产生了隔阂。

sentences.en: Nearly a year later, it was agreed that Tom would be statemented.
sentences.cn: 近一年后，汤姆被批准将获得特殊教育。

sentences.en: They say "Tom, shut up" and I go "No, you shut up"
sentences.cn: 他们说：“汤姆，你闭嘴！”我说：“才不呢，你们闭嘴！”

sentences.en: Tom admits that playing video games sometimes distracts him from his homework.
sentences.cn: 汤姆承认玩电子游戏有时会使他无心做作业。

sentences.en: Tom is genuinely appreciative of all the success he's had.
sentences.cn: 汤姆为他自己获得的所有成功由衷地感激。

sentences.en: Tom tried to staunch the blood with his handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 汤姆试图用手帕来止血。

sentences.en: Tom was in solitary across the way from me.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在我对面被单独监禁。

sentences.en: Tom was leading, a rifle slung over his back.
sentences.cn: 汤姆走在前面，背上挂着一支步枪。

sentences.en: Tom was utterly indiscreet, and could never keep a secret.
sentences.cn: 汤姆言语很不谨慎，什么时候也别想他守住秘密。

sentences.en: Tom wasted no time in telling me why he had come.
sentences.cn: 汤姆马上告诉了我他来的原因。

sentences.en: Tom's house is actually in better nick than mine.
sentences.cn: 说实在的，汤姆家房子的状况比我家的强。

汤姆·克鲁斯（美国著名影星）
汤姆·汉克斯（美国男电影演员）
汤姆历险记，汤姆·索亚历险记；汤姆·索亚
n. 大拇指汤姆（英民间故事中只有拇指大的主人公）
汤姆叔叔；逆来顺受的美国黑人

trans.tran_cn: 〈美口〉(像汤姆叔一样)逆来顺受
